sentences.sContent: As the happy time drew near, the lions and tigers climbing up the bedroom walls became quite tame and frolicsome.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the happy time drew near, the lions and tigers climbing up the bedroom walls became quite tame and frolicsome.
sentences.sCn: 当快乐的时光愈来愈临近的时候，卧室墙上爬着的狮子和老虎变得十分驯服和爱闹着玩了。

sentences.sContent: In the not too distant future. When the pup had grown lanky and 26)frolicsome—the wolf would return to the mountainside.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the not too distant future. When the pup had grown lanky and 26)frolicsome—the wolf would return to the mountainside.
sentences.sCn: 在不远的将来，当小狗崽长到可以四处奔跑嬉戏的时候——狼会回到山坡。

trans.tranCn: 爱闹着玩的， 嬉戏的
trans.tranOther: given to frolicking; merry and playful
